articles.title: OnePlus 10 Pro and OnePlus Nord 2 CE release dates posed a month apart from each other - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: According to reports, OnePlus has begun internally testing the OnePlus 10 Pro in Europe and India, shortly after the company wrapped up testing the Nord 2 CE. Both smartphones should arrive during Q1 2022, but a month apart. The OnePlus Nord 2 CE is tipped to…

articles.author: Meghna Sen
articles.title: Tech Mahindra acquires 100% stake in European firm CTC for ₹2,628 cr - Mint
articles.description: The acquisition of CTC is the second-largest acquisition that the firm has made after scam-hit Satyam in April 2010
articles.content: IT giant Tech Mahindra on Monday announced the acquisition of 100% stake in Europe-based Com tec Co IT (CTC) for 310 million euros (approximately 2,628 crore), a deal which includes earnouts and syne… [+18 chars]
